deal.II
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which deal.II installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using deal.II, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load deal.II/9.3.3-foss-2021a
```
